alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Davidson, northern Rutherford, northeastern Williamson and southern Wilson Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brentwood to La Vergne to near Gladeville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Lebanon, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Nolensville, Oak Hill, Walterhill, Rural Hill, Antioch, Lascassas, Triune, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park and Gladeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 70 and 75. Interstate 24 between mile markers 57 and 80. Interstate 840 between mile markers 42 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
